metadata.title: CVE-2022-26485 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
Removing an XSLT parameter during processing could have lead to anexploitable use-after-free. We have had reports of attacks in the wildabusing this flaw. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 97.0.2, Firefox ESR< 91.6.1, Firefox for Android < 97.3.0, Thunderbird < 91.6.2, and Focus <97.3.0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26485` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 97.0.2+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 97.0.2+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 97.0.2+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '97.0.2+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
